Activity: Arrive at the office. Attend the daily stand-up meeting. Briefly present the progress on the character model refinement.
Continue refining the player character model. Focus on the hands and feet, which are usually the trickiest parts. Aim to finish the base mesh refinement today.
Reach out to @TART-1 to discuss the rigging requirements for the character model. Topic: Character Rigging Requirements - Player Model
Lunch break. Play a quick round of Counter-Strike with @3DMOD-1 and @TART-1 to unwind.
Begin working on the basic animations for the player character (idle, walk, run). Start with the idle animation, focusing on subtle movements and breathing.
Experiment with different animation techniques and software features. Consult online tutorials and documentation for reference.
Continue working on the walk cycle animation. Pay attention to weight distribution, timing, and overall realism.
Wrap up the day. Save the animation progress and create a backup. Prepare for tomorrow by listing animation checkpoints.
